title: [Bug]: Status not updated
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

In my teams most peoples Status is not changed to Away when not using Teams. Seems connected to using the MATE Desktop(GNOME2 fork), KDE users seem fine though.

### What package are you using?

tar.gz

### Version

2.0.12

### Reproduction steps

```markdown

```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
